introduction: You can download my CV to discover my professional background, as well as check my personal projects on my GitHub account. If you want to contact me in a professional context, you can also visit my LinkedIn profile.
contact-note: Note: if you want to contact me in a professional context, please do so via Linkedin first. For any other reason you can send me an email, or a message via WhatsApp.
meta-description: You can find me on Linkedin and Github. You can also download my resume.
